content.en: Fringe pattern analysis: Researchers have been investigating the capabilities of algorithms in analyzing and processing fringe patterns in various scientific studies. These algorithms, such as continuous wavelet transform and Fourier transform, are being used to accurately estimate fringe density, demodulate fringe patterns, retrieve phase information, and measure 3D surface profiles. The research aims to improve the reliability, accuracy, and noise reduction capabilities of these algorithms, ultimately enhancing their performance in fringe pattern analysis.
content.da: Mønsteranalyse af frynser: Forskere har undersøgt algoritmers evner til at analysere og behandle frynsemønstre i forskellige videnskabelige studier. Disse algoritmer, såsom kontinuerlig bølgelettransformation og Fourier-transformation, bruges til præcist at estimere frynstæthed, demodulere frynsemønstre, hente faseinformation og måle 3D-overfladeprofiler. Forskningen sigter mod at forbedre pålideligheden, nøjagtigheden og støjreduktionskapaciteten hos disse algoritmer, hvilket i sidste ende forbedrer deres ydeevne i mønsteranalyse af frynser.
